incidents.name: WhatsApp Marketing Messages Disruption

incident_updates.body: Issue affecting delivery receipts for WhatsApp MMLite messages has been resolved and is operating normally at this time.

Delivery receipts for WhatsApp MMLite messages are now operating normally. We will continue to monitor for system stability. We'll provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are currently experiencing an issue affecting delivery receipts for WhatsApp MMLite messages. A small subset of customers may notice that their messages appear stuck in the "SENT" status. This is due to an outage with a third-party provider. We will share an update within the next 8 hours or sooner if more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Delivery Delays When Sending RCS Messages to AT&T

We have identified the fix and are currently rolling out the mitigation. We are seeing recovery in delivery delays when sending RCS messages to AT&T. Sending messages to any other carriers will not have any issues.  We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Legitimate SMS marked as SPAM on Android devices (in Google Messages)

incident_updates.body: The incident has been resolved, except for a small number of customers. We have escalated the issue to the involved handset operator for further investigation. We are closing this incident and will reach out to these customers individually for further follow-ups.

Following investigation by our engineering teams we have indentified this issue as affecting android handsets. There is no indication this is as a result of Twilio systems. We have escalated to the involved handset operator for investigation. Twilio will provide additional updates as they become available.

Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with SMS that are successfully delivered (no filtering) however, on Android handsets, those messages are being marked as SPAM. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Programmable Messaging API returned 503 to the customers

incident_updates.body: The Twilio Programmable Messaging API was partially degraded starting from Oct 08th, 2025, 15:14:50 PST and ending at 15:15:00 PST.
